summary: This bill, H.R. 544, aims to create a private right of action against manufacturers of ghost gun components and individuals who facilitate their sale. It allows individuals injured by a ghost gun, family members of those killed, and state/local governments to sue in federal court for damages.  It defines a ghost gun and includes affirmative defenses for self-defense or law enforcement actions. The bill seeks to address the issue of gun violence by holding those involved in the manufacture or sale of untraceable firearms accountable.
